attributes.action: set out an agenda to make the UK totally self sufficient in terms of renewable energy by 2107
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Develop tidal, wind, solar, geothermal, building design, and home energy generation to ensure the UK is totally self sufficient in 100 years time. Think big.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SaveThePlanet/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
